attributes.action: Bearwood Rd Wokingham, installation of pavement/cycle path
attributes.additional_details: Bearwood Rd Wokingham is very dangerous for pedestrians & cyclists but many people use it. Not only for exercise but to get to Bearwood Colledge, Catherine's Lodge & schools which at present people living in Barkham use their cars. There are pavements either end of this road but for 1mile approx. it is particularly dangerousness due to ditches either side and blind corners. The road is constantly used by heavy goods lorries using A1 scrap yard. A cycle path/pedestrian footpath should be installed.
